metadata.description: Anthropomorphic hippo in melancholic urban scenes

base_style_prefix: Cinematic still from an independent film. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo character, wearing simple human clothing (wool coat, scarf), standing or sitting naturally among humans who largely ignore or barely acknowledge them. The hippo has expressive, slightly melancholic eyes that convey quiet loneliness. Shot on 35mm film with natural lighting, shallow depth of field. The humans in the scene are real, photographed people going about their lives.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_bar_closing
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo character wearing a worn tweed coat sits alone at a bar counter at closing time. Empty glasses nearby, bartender wiping down the counter in background, warm tungsten lighting from pendant lamps, wood paneling. The hippo's skin has visible textile/rubber texture. Other bar patrons leaving in the background, putting on coats.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_bus_rain
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in a cable-knit sweater sitting in a bus window seat, watching rain streak down the glass. Night scene, city lights blurred outside, fluorescent interior lighting. The hippo's skin has visible texture. A few human passengers scattered in other seats, absorbed in phones or sleeping.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_diner_3am
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in a rumpled shirt sitting alone in a vinyl diner booth at 3am. Cup of coffee, untouched pie slice. Harsh overhead fluorescent mixed with neon from window. The hippo's skin has matte puppet texture. One tired waitress in background, maybe one other late-night customer.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_phonebooth
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo squeezed into an old phone booth on a city street at dusk. Holding receiver to ear, breath visible in cold air. Street lamps coming on, a few pedestrians walking past without noticing. The hippo's wool coat pressed against glass, skin with puppet texture.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_park_autumn
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in a corduroy jacket sitting alone on a park bench in autumn. Fallen leaves around, bare trees, golden hour light. The hippo's skin has visible puppet texture. A jogger passing by, a couple walking a dog in distance, no one engaging with the hippo.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_subway
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in an overcoat waiting alone on a subway platform. Tile walls, fluorescent lights, approaching train visible in tunnel. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. Other commuters spaced out along platform, looking at phones or watches.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_hotel_lobby
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo with a small suitcase standing at a hotel check-in desk. Art deco lobby, bell hop in background, chandelier lighting. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. Concierge behind desk looking slightly uncomfortable but professional.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_hospital
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in a cardigan sitting in a hospital waiting room. Plastic chairs, harsh lighting, muted green walls. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. A few other people waiting, a nurse passing by, TV mounted on wall.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_theater
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in a blazer sitting alone in an empty theater row. Red velvet seats, house lights on, empty stage. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. Maybe one usher in the distant aisle.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_cafe
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo in a turtleneck sitting at a cafe window seat. Steaming cup, rain outside, afternoon light. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. Other patrons at nearby tables absorbed in laptops or conversations.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_train
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo with a duffle bag standing on a train station platform. Departure board overhead, luggage carts, pigeons. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. Travelers rushing past, a train arriving.

prompts.name: hippo_stopmotion_laundromat
prompts.prompt: Stop-motion animation style, reminiscent of Wes Anderson films with symmetrical framing and muted pastel color palette. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo sitting on a plastic chair in a late-night laundromat. Spinning dryers, fluorescent lights, folding table. The hippo's skin has puppet texture. One other person folding clothes across the room, not interacting.

prompts.name: hippo_claymation_bar_closing
prompts.prompt: Claymation animation style like Aardman studios, with visible clay texture and fingerprints, slightly exaggerated proportions. A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo with smooth gray clay skin wearing a raincoat sits at a bar at closing time. The bartender (human clay figure) cleaning glasses. Warm lighting, wood textures, beer taps visible. Other clay figures in background.

prompts.name: hippo_cgi_bar_closing

A life-sized anthropomorphic hippo with realistic gray skin and small expressive eyes wearing a peacoat sits at a real bar at closing time. Real bartender in background, warm practical lighting, bottles on shelves. Atmospheric, slightly melancholic mood.

A 2D animated anthropomorphic hippo with expressive ink lines and watercolor washes sits at a real photographed bar at closing time. The hippo has a slightly sketchy quality, visible brushstrokes. Real people in background.
